pilots.name: "Howlrunner"
pilots.caption: Obsidian Leader
pilots.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-1 performs a primary attack, that ship may reroll 1 die.

pilots.name: "Mauler" Mithel
pilots.caption: Black Two
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack at attack range 1 roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: "Night Beast"
pilots.caption: Obsidian Two
pilots.ability: After you fully execute a blue maneuver you may perform a [Focus] action.

pilots.name: "Scourge" Skutu
pilots.caption: Seasoned Veteran
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack against an enemy in your [Bullseye], roll 1 additional attack dice.

pilots.name: "Wampa"
pilots.caption: Black Eleven
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Charge] to roll 1 additional attack die. After defending, lose 1 [Charge].

pilots.name: Academy Pilot
pilots.text: The Galactic Empire uses the fast and agile TIE/ln, developed by Sienar Fleet Systems and produced in staggering quantity, as its primary starfighter.

pilots.name: Black Squadron Ace
pilots.text: The elite TIE/ln pilots of Black Squadron accompanied Darth Vader on a devastating strike against the rebel forces at the Battle of Yavin.

pilots.name: Del Meeko
pilots.caption: Inferno Three
pilots.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 defends against a damaged attacker, the defender may reroll 1 defense die.

pilots.name: Gideon Hask
pilots.caption: Inferno Two
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack against a damaged defender, roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: Iden Versio
pilots.caption: Inferno Leader
pilots.ability: Before a friendly TIE/ln fighter at range 0-1 would suffer 1 or more damage you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, prevent that damage.

pilots.name: Obsidian Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: The TIE fighter's Twin Ion Engine system was designed for speed, making the TIE/ln one of the most maneuverable starships ever mass produced.

pilots.name: Seyn Marana
pilots.caption: Inferno Four
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Crit] result. If you do, deal 1 facedown damage card to the defender, then cancel your remaining results.

pilots.name: Valen Rudor
pilots.caption: Braggadocious Baron
pilots.ability: After a friendly ship at range 0-1 defends (after damage is resolved, if any), you may perform an action.
